an10.45:0.4: “Mendicants, there are ten drawbacks to entering a royal harem.
an10.45:0.6: Firstly, a king is sitting with his chief queen
an10.45:0.8: When the queen sees the monk she smiles, or when the monk sees the queen he smiles.
an10.45:0.10: ‘They’ve done it for sure, or they will do it.’
an10.45:0.11: This is the first drawback of entering a royal harem.
an10.45:2.1: Furthermore, a king has many duties, and much to do. He has sex with one of the women but doesn’t remember.
an10.45:2.4: ‘No-one else has entered here, except for that monk.
an10.45:2.5: Could this be the monk’s doing?’
an10.45:2.6: This is the second drawback of entering a royal harem.
an10.45:3.1: Furthermore, a gem is lost somewhere in the royal harem.
an10.45:3.3: ‘No-one else has entered here, except for that monk.
an10.45:3.4: Could this be the monk’s doing?’
an10.45:3.5: This is the third drawback of entering a royal harem.
an10.45:4.1: Furthermore, secret deliberations in the royal harem are leaked outside.
an10.45:4.3: ‘No-one else has entered here, except for that monk.
an10.45:4.4: Could this be the monk’s doing?’
an10.45:4.5: This is the fourth drawback of entering a royal harem.
an10.45:5.1: Furthermore, in a royal harem, a father longs for their son, or a son longs for his father.
an10.45:5.3: ‘No-one else has entered here, except for that monk.
an10.45:5.4: Could this be the monk’s doing?’
an10.45:5.5: This is the fifth drawback of entering a royal harem.
an10.45:6.1: Furthermore, the king promotes someone to a higher position.
an10.45:6.2: Those who are upset by this think:
an10.45:6.3: ‘The king is close to that monk.
an10.45:6.4: Could this be the monk’s doing?’
an10.45:6.5: This is the sixth drawback of entering a royal harem.
an10.45:7.1: Furthermore, the king demotes someone to a lower position.
an10.45:7.2: Those who are upset by this think:
an10.45:7.3: ‘The king is close to that monk.
an10.45:7.4: Could this be the monk’s doing?’
an10.45:7.5: This is the seventh drawback of entering a royal harem.
an10.45:8.1: Furthermore, the king dispatches the army at the wrong time.
an10.45:8.2: Those who are upset by this think:
an10.45:8.3: ‘The king is close to that monk.
an10.45:8.4: Could this be the monk’s doing?’
an10.45:8.5: This is the eighth drawback of entering a royal harem.
an10.45:9.1: Furthermore, the king dispatches the army at the right time, but orders it to turn back while still on the road.
an10.45:9.2: Those who are upset by this think:
an10.45:9.3: ‘The king is close to that monk.
an10.45:9.4: Could this be the monk’s doing?’
an10.45:9.5: This is the ninth drawback of entering a royal harem.
an10.45:10.1: Furthermore, in the royal harem there is a trampling of elephants, horses, and chariots, as well as arousing sights, sounds, smells, tastes, and touches that do not befit a monk.
an10.45:10.2: This is the tenth drawback of entering a royal harem.
an10.45:10.3: These are the ten drawbacks of entering a royal harem.”
